thread.title: Jason And Brittany Aldean Spend Night In The ER With Son Memphis
thread.title_full: Jason And Brittany Aldean Spend Night In The ER With Son Memphis

title: Jason And Brittany Aldean Spend Night In The ER With Son Memphis
text:
Gladly, Memphis is okay! Jason Aldean and his wife, Brittany, recently shared on Instagram that they had to spend the night in the ER with their son, Memphis.
“The Big Green Tractor” singer has four kids: two daughters, Keeley and Kendyl, with his ex-wife, and a son and a daughter, Memphis and Navy, with his wife, Brittany.
Memphis was born on December 1, 2017, and is currently seven years old. A few days ago, he gave his parents quite a scare when he broke his collarbone and had to stay in the hospital overnight.
Brittany Aldean Shared What Happened In A Lighthearted Instagram Story Brittany posted a video on her story showing her kneeling next to her son, Memphis, on the hospital bed.
In the video, you can hear the family talking and discussing the ordeal.
Jason asks him if he is feeling better, to which he responds, “Kind of.” The singer then tries to explain what might happen to his son, saying,
“I hope it’s not broke, but I think maybe you’re probably gonna have to get a little sling. I bet they’ll give you a little sling.”
Brittany wrote over the screen, “Still making us laugh even in the ER,” clearly trying to bring some humor to the intense situation.
Off camera, you can hear what is probably Jason Aldean’s dad telling Memphis that he should tell his friends that he got the injury fighting off multiple assailants.
Which Memphis takes seriously, saying there’s no way he could beat anyone up in his current state. Everyone in the room disagrees, clearly trying to improve his mood, saying he could or is “strong.”
Memphis hilariously responds, “With this arm? Absolutely not!
This makes his parents laugh.
Memphis in the hospital. (brittanyaldean / Instagram) RELATED: Jason Aldean Shares His Thoughts On Post Malone Going Country
Gladly, he is doing well.
After the video, Brittany shared a photo explaining what happened to their son. She shared that Memphis broke his collarbone but will be “healed” soon.
The family did not disclose how he got his injury and has not posted a more recent update.
Brittany’s story update. (brittanyaldean / Instagram) Return here for any future updates, and get better soon, Memphis!
